docs.snippet: Former UFC heavyweight champion Brock Lesnar has been notified of a potential violation of the promotion's anti-doping policy from an out-of-competition drug test administered June 28....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former UFC heavyweight champion Brock Lesnar has been notified of a potential violation of the promotion's anti-doping policy from an out-of-competition drug test administered June 28.

headline.main: Brock Lesnar: 'We Will Get to the Bottom' of Doping Test
headline.print_headline: Brock Lesnar: 'We Will Get to the Bottom' of Doping Test

docs.snippet: His proposal for a religious inquisition is rife with misunderstanding....
docs.lead_paragraph: His proposal for a religious inquisition is rife with misunderstanding.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by law professor Noah Feldman attempts to clear up pervasive misunderstanding of concept of Shariah in light of Newt Gingrich's unconstitutional proposal to deport people who believe in it; notes while all Muslims believe Shariah is important part of their tradition and faith, there are wide disagreements about what it means in practice.

headline.main: A Lesson for Newt Gingrich: What Shariah Is (and Isn’t)

docs.snippet: Mike Napoli had three hits, including his 19th home run, Carlos Carrasco pitched into the seventh inning and the Cleveland Indians beat the Minnesota Twins 5-2 on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli had three hits, including his 19th home run, Carlos Carrasco pitched into the seventh inning and the Cleveland Indians beat the Minnesota Twins 5-2 on Friday night.

headline.main: Napoli, Carrasco Shine as Indians Topple Twins
headline.print_headline: Napoli, Carrasco Shine as Indians Topple Twins

docs.snippet: Walt Weiss had specific instructions for his hitters before the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walt Weiss had specific instructions for his hitters before the game.

headline.main: Rockies Use Pair of 4-Run Innings to Pummel Braves 11-2
headline.print_headline: Rockies Use Pair of 4-Run Innings to Pummel Braves 11-2

docs.snippet: Bomb attacks on Turkey's parliament are continuing, a senior Turkish official said on Saturday, adding that rebel soldiers have been warned they will be shot down if they attempt to use more military aircraft....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bomb attacks on Turkey's parliament are continuing, a senior Turkish official said on Saturday, adding that rebel soldiers have been warned they will be shot down if they attempt to use more military aircraft.

headline.main: Bomb Attacks Continue on Turkey's Parliament: Senior Official
headline.print_headline: Bomb Attacks Continue on Turkey's Parliament: Senior Official

docs.snippet: Maritime authorities shut Istanbul's Bosphorus Strait to transiting tankers on Saturday "for security and safety" reasons, shipping agent GAC said, after what the government said was an attempted coup by a faction in the military....
docs.lead_paragraph: Maritime authorities shut Istanbul's Bosphorus Strait to transiting tankers on Saturday "for security and safety" reasons, shipping agent GAC said, after what the government said was an attempted coup by a faction in the military.

headline.main: Authorities Shut Istanbul's Bosphorus to Tankers for 'Security Reasons': Agent
headline.print_headline: Authorities Shut Istanbul's Bosphorus to Tankers for 'Security Reasons': Agent

docs.snippet: Former Panamanian dictator Manuel Noriega will undergo surgery to remove a benign brain tumour, his doctor said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Panamanian dictator Manuel Noriega will undergo surgery to remove a benign brain tumour, his doctor said on Friday.

headline.main: Panama's Ex-Dictator Noriega to Have Surgery on Brain Tumor
headline.print_headline: Panama's Ex-Dictator Noriega to Have Surgery on Brain Tumor

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court ruled Friday that the U.S. Navy was wrongly allowed to use sonar that could harm whales and other marine life....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ruled Friday that the U.S. Navy was wrongly allowed to use sonar that could harm whales and other marine life.

headline.main: Federal Appeals Court Rejects Navy Sonar-Use Rules
headline.print_headline: Federal Appeals Court Rejects Navy Sonar-Use Rules

docs.snippet: Forty-two people were killed in the Turkish capital Ankara during an attempted coup that started on Friday night, a senior Turkish official said, confirming an earlier report from state-run Anadolu Agency....
docs.lead_paragraph: Forty-two people were killed in the Turkish capital Ankara during an attempted coup that started on Friday night, a senior Turkish official said, confirming an earlier report from state-run Anadolu Agency.

headline.main: Official Says 42 People Killed in Ankara During Turkish Coup Attempt
headline.print_headline: Official Says 42 People Killed in Ankara During Turkish Coup Attempt

docs.snippet: The bottom two teams in the NL Central resumed the season with a game that came down to the last pitch. The last-place Reds got the better of it....
docs.lead_paragraph: The bottom two teams in the NL Central resumed the season with a game that came down to the last pitch. The last-place Reds got the better of it.

headline.main: Doubles by Duvall, Barnhart Rally Reds Over Brewers 5-4
